traits.name: Amphibious
traits.description: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Weakening Breath.

actions.name: Rend
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach 10 ft. Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. Failure: 55 (10d10) Fire damage. Success: Half damage.

actions.name: Weakening Breath
actions.description: Strength Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature that isnâ€™t currently affected by this breath in a 30-foot Cone. Failure: The target has Disadvantage on Strength-based D20 Tests and subtracts 3 (1d6) from its damage rolls. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.
